1.speaker: A
sentence: How did you get into an accident?

2.speaker: B
sentence: A man crashed into my car and ran away.
남자가 내 차에 충돌했어 그리고 도망갔어.

3.speaker: A
sentence: That was close. Did you figure out who did that?
큰일 날 뻔했다. 너는 밝혀냈니 누가 했는지 그걸?

4.speaker: B
sentence: Yes. But he was trying to put the blame on me.
응. 그런데 그는 시도했었어 나의 탓으로 돌리다.

5.speaker: A
sentence: You're out of lucky today. Hope it works out for you.
너 운이 없구나 오늘. 바랄께 그게 잘 되길 널 위해.

6.speaker: B
sentence: I was so upset. I almost burst into tears.
나 너무 속상해서. 나 거의 울음을 터뜨릴뻔했어.
